dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer52 - Universal Remote
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Universal Remote ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Universal Remote ] / :
Home Theater Store  (MX 3000)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.hometheaterstore.com/photos/MX3000-2.jpg&size=2&dhm=e1efe832&hl=en
Digital Foto Discount Club (MRF 100)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://216.25.78.123/pics/tball/MRF100.jpg&size=2&dhm=d9dda7c6&hl=en
J & R Music and Computer World (MX 3000)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://images.jr.com/productimages/UNVMX3000.PNG%3FWID%3D150%26CVT%3DJPEG&size=2&dhm=95a31527&hl=en
CCE (MRF 300)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://cceshop.com/catalog/images/Universal_Remote/UNIVERSAL!MRF300!FRONT.jpg&size=2&dhm=56b37c81&hl=en
Radar City Mobile Electronics and AV Warehouse (URC 300)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.radarcity.com/images/products/large/8164.jpg&size=2&dhm=5330968f&hl=en
TV Authority (MX 800)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.tvauthority.com/itemimages/MX800RFS.jpg&size=2&dhm=445d961d&hl=en
Brilliant Store (URC 100)
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.brilliant-electronics.com/images/universal-urc100.jpg&size=2&dhm=158234ce&hl=en
 
 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [ Jonquil Bellamy ]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601]
Email [google@netenforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 9/25/2006]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Jonquil Bellamy
